item.title: 3 Years of PyCon Namibia
item.description:
Description

Vince Knight

The Cardiff University Phoenix Project is a partnership with the University of Namibia. One of the projects is the organisation of an annual Python conference in Windhoek (the capital). This talk will describe the 3 conferences that have taken place and reflect on plans for the future of Python in Namibia.
item.dc:creator: Vince Knight
